Items.Title: Oversight - Examining Racial Disparities in New York City’s Child Welfare System.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examining Racial Disparities in New York City’s Child Welfare System.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the commissioner of health and mental hygiene to establish and operate a pilot program providing free mental health services to children who have been returned to their home following a removal, and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish and operate a pilot program providing free mental health services to children who have been returned to their home following a removal.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring child protective specialists to provide certain information to parents and other persons legally responsible for the care of children who are the subject of reports of child abuse or maltreatment
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide certain information to parents and other persons legally responsible for the care of children who are the subject of reports of child abuse or maltreatment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the administration for children’s services to provide a multilingual disclosure form to parents or guardians during a child protective investigation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the administration for children’s services to provide a multilingual disclosure form to parents or guardians during a child protective investigation.
